Why 5G Networks Need Embedded Security

By embedding security capabilities within the 5G mobile network, CSPs gain several benefits, including the ability to identify and mitigate threats more quickly; correlation of threats across multiple monitoring locations; gaining a complete view of endpoint behavior; and ensuring that security capabilities grow with the network as needed.
